text: When I was visiting Sentosa, it started raining heavily, so I was extremely happy to find raincoats at this shop. Buying one let me continue sightseeing without getting soaked. Big thanks to the shop for having them in stock.

Eden was extremely nice and helpful. He cares for his customers and went the extra mile to help me charge my phone when I was panicking that it was running out of battery and saved me so much trouble!! All the staff have extremely positive attitudes and this experience really made my dayüòÅüòÅ

I really appreciate the atmosphere and the effort Eden put into his service. The way he curated the products and maintained the shop cleanliness and makes it such a pleasant place to visit. It‚Äôs clear that he take pride in his work and it truly makes a difference!

Great store for quick stoppage to get some necessity. Not too big but you can get the needs that you want.But the chilled drinks at times not too cold.The snacks bar is good for you to grab something hot and fresh like the pastries.It can be very crowded at times but cashier staffs is very efficient.
My daughter left something in the store and Eden went out of his way to protect it and even drop it at a closer location for me to pick-up. That's customer service !
